main event: Two white lights were observed flying parallel to a Trans-Texas Airlines aircraft over Shreveport, Louisiana on June 3, 1957.
interesting points: The lights were visible for approximately one hour at around 9,000 feet altitude,The objects were confirmed on radar and observed by tower personnel,At one point, the lights flared extremely bright in response to the aircraft's landing lights,There have been reports of multiple B-47s conducting refueling operations in the area at that time,The lights eventually lost sight as the aircraft descended.
sighted object: two white lights in the sky
